mapper.select: select ifnull(SUM(base_wage),0) from t_wage where work_time between date(#{beginTime}) and date(#{endTime})

SELECT SUM(w.base_wage)+SUM(e.money) totalValue,w.depart_id as intType FROM t_wage w,t_expense e WHERE DATE_FORMAT(w.work_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(e.create_time,'%Y') AND DATE_FORMAT(w.work_time,'%Y') =#{year} AND e.status =1 GROUP BY intType
